gateway.remote.url.label: Remote Gateway URL
gateway.remote.url.help: Remote Gateway WebSocket URL (ws:// or wss://).

gateway.remote.sshTarget.label: Remote Gateway SSH Target
gateway.remote.sshTarget.help: Remote gateway over SSH (tunnels the gateway port to localhost). Format: user@host or user@host:port.

gateway.remote.sshIdentity.label: Remote Gateway SSH Identity
gateway.remote.sshIdentity.help: Optional SSH identity file path (passed to ssh -i).

gateway.auth.token.label: Gateway Token
gateway.auth.token.help: Required for multi-machine access or non-loopback binds.

gateway.controlUi.basePath.label: Control UI Base Path
gateway.controlUi.basePath.help: Optional URL prefix where the Control UI is served (e.g. /clawdbot).

gateway.reload.mode.label: Config Reload Mode
gateway.reload.mode.help: Hot reload strategy for config changes ("hybrid" recommended).

gateway.reload.debounceMs.label: Config Reload Debounce (ms)
gateway.reload.debounceMs.help: Debounce window (ms) before applying config changes.

auth.profiles.label: Auth Profiles
auth.profiles.help: Named auth profiles (provider + mode + optional email).

auth.order.label: Auth Profile Order
auth.order.help: Ordered auth profile IDs per provider (used for automatic failover).

auth.cooldowns.billingBackoffHours.label: Billing Backoff (hours)
auth.cooldowns.billingBackoffHours.help: Base backoff (hours) when a profile fails due to billing/insufficient credits (default: 5).

auth.cooldowns.billingBackoffHoursByProv.label: Billing Backoff Overrides
auth.cooldowns.billingBackoffHoursByProv.help: Optional per-provider overrides for billing backoff (hours).

agents.defaults.models.label: Models
agents.defaults.models.help: Configured model catalog (keys are full provider/model IDs).

agents.defaults.model.fallbacks.label: Model Fallbacks
agents.defaults.model.fallbacks.help: Ordered fallback models (provider/model). Used when the primary model fails.

agents.defaults.imageModel.primary.label: Image Model
agents.defaults.imageModel.primary.help: Optional image model (provider/model) used when the primary model lacks image input.

commands.native.label: Native Commands
commands.native.help: Register native commands with connectors that support it (Discord/Slack/Telegram).

commands.text.label: Text Commands
commands.text.help: Allow text command parsing (slash commands only).

commands.restart.label: Allow Restart
commands.restart.help: Allow /restart and gateway restart tool actions (default: false).

session.agentToAgent.maxPingPongTurns.label: Agent-to-Agent Ping-Pong Turns
session.agentToAgent.maxPingPongTurns.help: Max reply-back turns between requester and target (05).

messages.ackReaction.label: Ack Reaction Emoji
messages.ackReaction.help: Emoji reaction used to acknowledge inbound messages (empty disables).

telegram.dmPolicy.label: Telegram DM Policy
telegram.dmPolicy.help: Direct message access control ("pairing" recommended). "open" requires telegram.allowFrom=["*"].

telegram.streamMode.label: Telegram Draft Stream Mode
telegram.streamMode.help: Draft streaming mode for Telegram replies (off | partial | block). Separate from block streaming; requires private topics + sendMessageDraft.

telegram.retry.attempts.label: Telegram Retry Attempts
telegram.retry.attempts.help: Max retry attempts for outbound Telegram API calls (default: 3).

telegram.retry.minDelayMs.label: Telegram Retry Min Delay (ms)
telegram.retry.minDelayMs.help: Minimum retry delay in ms for Telegram outbound calls.

telegram.retry.maxDelayMs.label: Telegram Retry Max Delay (ms)
telegram.retry.maxDelayMs.help: Maximum retry delay cap in ms for Telegram outbound calls.

telegram.retry.jitter.label: Telegram Retry Jitter
telegram.retry.jitter.help: Jitter factor (0-1) applied to Telegram retry delays.

whatsapp.dmPolicy.label: WhatsApp DM Policy
whatsapp.dmPolicy.help: Direct message access control ("pairing" recommended). "open" requires whatsapp.allowFrom=["*"].

whatsapp.selfChatMode.label: WhatsApp Self-Phone Mode
whatsapp.selfChatMode.help: Same-phone setup (bot uses your personal WhatsApp number).

signal.dmPolicy.label: Signal DM Policy
signal.dmPolicy.help: Direct message access control ("pairing" recommended). "open" requires signal.allowFrom=["*"].

imessage.dmPolicy.label: iMessage DM Policy
imessage.dmPolicy.help: Direct message access control ("pairing" recommended). "open" requires imessage.allowFrom=["*"].

discord.dm.policy.label: Discord DM Policy
discord.dm.policy.help: Direct message access control ("pairing" recommended). "open" requires discord.dm.allowFrom=["*"].

discord.retry.attempts.label: Discord Retry Attempts
discord.retry.attempts.help: Max retry attempts for outbound Discord API calls (default: 3).

discord.retry.minDelayMs.label: Discord Retry Min Delay (ms)
discord.retry.minDelayMs.help: Minimum retry delay in ms for Discord outbound calls.

discord.retry.maxDelayMs.label: Discord Retry Max Delay (ms)
discord.retry.maxDelayMs.help: Maximum retry delay cap in ms for Discord outbound calls.

discord.retry.jitter.label: Discord Retry Jitter
discord.retry.jitter.help: Jitter factor (0-1) applied to Discord retry delays.

discord.maxLinesPerMessage.label: Discord Max Lines Per Message
discord.maxLinesPerMessage.help: Soft max line count per Discord message (default: 17).

slack.dm.policy.label: Slack DM Policy
slack.dm.policy.help: Direct message access control ("pairing" recommended). "open" requires slack.dm.allowFrom=["*"].

slack.allowBots.label: Slack Allow Bot Messages
slack.allowBots.help: Allow bot-authored messages to trigger Slack replies (default: false).
